testprocedure.test-case-summary: This test procedure is called by a test case and is used to verify the SUTs support of the dlOrganizationInformationSubscription dialog as an OC using variables provided by the calling test case. This procedure supports verification of requirements related to user need 2.3.3 [Need to Provide Information on Organizations] and is used for both valid and invalid test cases.

testStep.functionId: Step 1 CONFIGURE: Determine the Application Layer Standard that will be used for this test. RECORD this information as: ApplicationLayerStandard: ${ApplicationLayerStandard}

Step 2 CONFIGURE: Determine whether Organization Name is required by the specification. (NRTM 3.3.3.5.2.1). RECORD this information as: TMDD_N5R25_Organization_Name_Supported = ${TMDD_N5R25_Organization_Name_Supported}

Step 3 CONFIGURE: Determine whether Organization Location is required by the specification. (NRTM 3.3.3.5.2.2). RECORD this information as: TMDD_N5R26_Organization_Location_Supported = ${TMDD_N5R26_Organization_Location_Supported}

Step 4 CONFIGURE: Determine whether Organization Function Description is required by the specification. (NRTM 3.3.3.5.2.3). RECORD this information as: TMDD_N5R27_Organization_Function_Description_Supported = ${TMDD_N5R27_Organization_Function_Description_Supported}

Step 5 CONFIGURE: Determine whether Organization Contact Information is required by the specification. (NRTM 3.3.3.5.2.4). RECORD this information as: TMDD_N5R28_Organization_Contact_Information_Supported = ${TMDD_N5R28_Organization_Contact_Information_Supported}

Step 6 CONFIGURE: Determine whether Required Organization Contact Information is required by the specification. (NRTM 3.3.3.5.2.4.1). RECORD this information as: TMDD_N5R29_Required_Organization_Contact_Information_Supported = ${TMDD_N5R29_Required_Organization_Contact_Information_Supported}

Step 7 CONFIGURE: Determine whether Contact Person Name is required by the specification. (NRTM 3.3.3.5.2.4.2.1). RECORD this information as: TMDD_N5R30_Contact_Person_Name_Supported = ${TMDD_N5R30_Contact_Person_Name_Supported}

Step 8 CONFIGURE: Determine whether Contact Person Role is required by the specification. (NRTM 3.3.3.5.2.4.2.2). RECORD this information as: TMDD_N5R31_Contact_Person_Role_Supported = ${TMDD_N5R31_Contact_Person_Role_Supported}

Step 9 CONFIGURE: Determine whether Work Phone Number is required by the specification. (NRTM 3.3.3.5.2.4.2.3). RECORD this information as: TMDD_N5R32_Work_Phone_Number_Supported = ${TMDD_N5R32_Work_Phone_Number_Supported}

Step 10 CONFIGURE: Determine whether Alternate Phone Number is required by the specification. (NRTM 3.3.3.5.2.4.2.4). RECORD this information as: TMDD_N5R33_Alternate_Phone_Number_Supported = ${TMDD_N5R33_Alternate_Phone_Number_Supported}

Step 11 CONFIGURE: Determine whether Cellular Phone Number is required by the specification. (NRTM 3.3.3.5.2.4.2.5). RECORD this information as: TMDD_N5R34_Cellular_Phone_Number_Supported = ${TMDD_N5R34_Cellular_Phone_Number_Supported}

Step 12 CONFIGURE: Determine whether Cellular Phone Identifier is required by the specification. (NRTM 3.3.3.5.2.4.2.6). RECORD this information as: TMDD_N5R35_Cellular_Phone_Identifier_Supported = ${TMDD_N5R35_Cellular_Phone_Identifier_Supported}

Step 13 CONFIGURE: Determine whether Fax Number is required by the specification. (NRTM 3.3.3.5.2.4.2.7). RECORD this information as: TMDD_N5R36_Fax_Number_Supported = ${TMDD_N5R36_Fax_Number_Supported}

Step 14 CONFIGURE: Determine whether Pager Number is required by the specification. (NRTM 3.3.3.5.2.4.2.8). RECORD this information as: TMDD_N5R37_Pager_Number_Supported = ${TMDD_N5R37_Pager_Number_Supported}

Step 15 CONFIGURE: Determine whether Pager Identifier is required by the specification. (NRTM 3.3.3.5.2.4.2.9). RECORD this information as: TMDD_N5R38_Pager_Identifier_Supported = ${TMDD_N5R38_Pager_Identifier_Supported}

Step 16 CONFIGURE: Determine whether Internet E-Mail Address is required by the specification. (NRTM 3.3.3.5.2.4.2.10). RECORD this information as: TMDD_N5R39_Internet_E-Mail_Address_Supported = ${TMDD_N5R39_Internet_E-Mail_Address_Supported}

Step 17 CONFIGURE: Determine whether Radio Unit Identifier is required by the specification. (NRTM 3.3.3.5.2.4.2.11). RECORD this information as: TMDD_N5R40_Radio_Unit_Identifier_Supported = ${TMDD_N5R40_Radio_Unit_Identifier_Supported}

Step 18 CONFIGURE: Determine whether Mailing Address Line 1 is required by the specification. (NRTM 3.3.3.5.2.4.2.12). RECORD this information as: TMDD_N5R41_Mailing_Address_Line_1_Supported = ${TMDD_N5R41_Mailing_Address_Line_1_Supported}

Step 19 CONFIGURE: Determine whether Mailing Address Line 2 is required by the specification. (NRTM 3.3.3.5.2.4.2.13). RECORD this information as: TMDD_N5R42_Mailing_Address_Line_2_Supported = ${TMDD_N5R42_Mailing_Address_Line_2_Supported}

Step 20 CONFIGURE: Determine whether Mailing Address City is required by the specification. (NRTM 3.3.3.5.2.4.2.14). RECORD this information as: TMDD_N5R43_Mailing_Address_City_Supported = ${TMDD_N5R43_Mailing_Address_City_Supported}

Step 21 CONFIGURE: Determine whether Mailing Address State is required by the specification. (NRTM 3.3.3.5.2.4.2.15). RECORD this information as: TMDD_N5R44_Mailing_Address_State_Supported = ${TMDD_N5R44_Mailing_Address_State_Supported}

Step 22 CONFIGURE: Determine whether Mailing Address Zip Code is required by the specification. (NRTM 3.3.3.5.2.4.2.16). RECORD this information as: TMDD_N5R45_Mailing_Address_Zip_Code_Supported = ${TMDD_N5R45_Mailing_Address_Zip_Code_Supported}

Step 23 CONFIGURE: Determine whether Mailing Address Country is required by the specification. (NRTM 3.3.3.5.2.4.2.17). RECORD this information as: TMDD_N5R46_Mailing_Address_Country_Supported = ${TMDD_N5R46_Mailing_Address_Country_Supported}

Step 24 CONFIGURE: Determine whether Organization Center Information is required by the specification. (NRTM 3.3.3.5.2.5). RECORD this information as: TMDD_N5R47_Organization_Center_Information_Supported = ${TMDD_N5R47_Organization_Center_Information_Supported}

Step 25 CONFIGURE: Determine whether Required Organization Center Information is required by the specification. (NRTM 3.3.3.5.2.5.1). RECORD this information as: TMDD_N5R48_Required_Organization_Center_Information_Supported = ${TMDD_N5R48_Required_Organization_Center_Information_Supported}

Step 26 CONFIGURE: Determine whether Organization Center Name is required by the specification. (NRTM 3.3.3.5.2.5.2.1). RECORD this information as: TMDD_N5R49_Organization_Center_Name_Supported = ${TMDD_N5R49_Organization_Center_Name_Supported}

Step 27 CONFIGURE: Determine whether Organization Center Location is required by the specification. (NRTM 3.3.3.5.2.5.2.2). RECORD this information as: TMDD_N5R50_Organization_Center_Location_Supported = ${TMDD_N5R50_Organization_Center_Location_Supported}

Step 28 CONFIGURE: Determine whether Organization Center Description is required by the specification. (NRTM 3.3.3.5.2.5.2.3). RECORD this information as: TMDD_N5R51_Organization_Center_Description_Supported = ${TMDD_N5R51_Organization_Center_Description_Supported}

Step 29 CONFIGURE: Determine whether Organization Center Type is required by the specification. (NRTM 3.3.3.5.2.5.2.4). RECORD this information as: TMDD_N5R52_Organization_Center_Type_Supported = ${TMDD_N5R52_Organization_Center_Type_Supported}

Step 30 CONFIGURE: Determine whether Organization Center Contact Information is required by the specification. (NRTM 3.3.3.5.2.5.2.5). RECORD this information as: TMDD_N5R53_Organization_Center_Contact_Information_Supported = ${TMDD_N5R53_Organization_Center_Contact_Information_Supported}

Step 31 CONFIGURE: Determine whether Date and Time Change Information is required by the specification. (NRTM 3.3.3.5.2.6). RECORD this information as: TMDD_N5R54_Date_and_Time_Change_Information_Supported = ${TMDD_N5R54_Date_and_Time_Change_Information_Supported}
Step 32 CONFIGURE: Determine the number of publication message transmissions that will be received within this test. RECORD this information as: PublicationsToReceive: ${PublicationsToReceive}
Step 33 CONFIGURE: Determine whether an error response message is expected for this test. RECORD this information as: PublicationErrorResponseExpected: ${PublicationErrorResponseExpected}

Step 34 CONFIGURE: IF PublicationErrorResponseExpected is true, determine the expected error code response for this test. RECORD this information as: PublicationErrorTypeExpected: ${PublicationErrorTypeExpected}
Step 35 CONFIGURE: Define the publication response message that will be sent to the SUT. RECORD this information as: PublicationResponseMessage: ${PublicationResponseMessage}
Step 36 CONFIGURE: Determine whether the Authentication parameters need to be verified within this test. RECORD this information as: AuthenticationCheck: ${AuthenticationCheck}
Step 37 CONFIGURE: Determine whether the SUT will be allowed access to the information requested in this test. RECORD this information as: AllowAccess: ${AllowAccess}
Step 38 CONFIGURE: Define the publication message that will be sent to the SUT. RECORD this information as: SubscriptionMessage: ${SubscriptionMessage}
Step 39 CONFIGURE: Determine whether an error response message is expected for this test. RECORD this information as: SubscriptionErrorResponseExpected: ${SubscriptionErrorResponseExpected}

Step 40 CONFIGURE: IF SubscriptionErrorResponseExpected is true, determine the expected error code response for this test. RECORD this information as: SubscriptionErrorTypeExpected: ${SubscriptionErrorTypeExpected}

Step 41 SUBSCRIPTION-EC with the following parameters: DIALOG=dlOrganizationInformationSubscription SUBSCRIPTIONMESSAGE = SubscriptionMessage SUBSCRIPTIONERRORRESPONSEEXPECTED = SubscriptionErrorResponseExpected SUBSCRIPTIONERRORTYPEEXPECTED = SubscriptionErrorTypeExpected Returns: CONTINUEPUBLICATION
Step 42 IF SubscriptionErrorResponseExpected is not equal to TRUE THEN CONTINUE, OTHERWISE skip the following substeps.
Step 42.1 WHILE CONTINUEPUBLICATION is equal to TRUE then CONTINUE, OTHERWISE skip the following substeps.

Step 42.1.1 PUBLICATION-EC-RECEIVE with the following parameters: DIALOG=dlOrganizationInformationUpdate PUBLICATIONSTORECEIVE = PublicationsToReceive PUBLICATIONERRORRESPONSEEXPECTED = PublicationErrorResponseExpected PUBLICATIONERRORTYPEEXPECTED = PublicationErrorTypeExpected AUTHENTICATIONCHECK = AuthenticationCheck ALLOWACCESS = AllowAccess Returns: CONTINUEPUBLICATION
Step 42.1.2 IF PublicationErrorResponseExpected is not equal to TRUE THEN CONTINUE, OTHERWISE skip the following substeps.
Step 42.1.2.1 IF TMDD_N5R25_Organization_Name_Supported is equal to TRUE THEN CONTINUE; OTHERWISE skip the following substeps.
Step 42.1.2.1.1 VERIFY that element organization-name exists within each instance of organizationInformationMsg.organization-information-item
Step 42.1.2.2 IF TMDD_N5R26_Organization_Location_Supported is equal to TRUE THEN CONTINUE; OTHERWISE skip the following substeps.
Step 42.1.2.2.1 VERIFY that element organization-location exists within each instance of organizationInformationMsg.organization-information-item
Step 42.1.2.3 IF TMDD_N5R27_Organization_Function_Description_Supported is equal to TRUE THEN CONTINUE; OTHERWISE skip the following substeps.
Step 42.1.2.3.1 VERIFY that element organization-function exists within each instance of organizationInformationMsg.organization-information-item
Step 42.1.2.4 IF TMDD_N5R28_Organization_Contact_Information_Supported is equal to TRUE THEN CONTINUE; OTHERWISE skip the following substeps.
Step 42.1.2.4.1 VERIFY that element organization-contact-details exists within each instance of organizationInformationMsg.organization-information-item
Step 42.1.2.5 IF TMDD_N5R29_Required_Organization_Contact_Information_Supported is equal to TRUE THEN CONTINUE; OTHERWISE skip the following substeps.
Step 42.1.2.5.1 VERIFY that element contact-id exists within each instance of organizationInformationMsg.organization-information-item.organization-contact-details

Step 42.1.2.5.2 VERIFY that element contact-id exists within each instance of organizationInformationMsg.organization-information-item.center-contact-list.center-contact-details.center-contact-details
Step 42.1.2.6 IF TMDD_N5R30_Contact_Person_Name_Supported is equal to TRUE THEN CONTINUE; OTHERWISE skip the following substeps.
Step 42.1.2.6.1 VERIFY that element person-name exists within each instance of organizationInformationMsg.organization-information-item.organization-contact-details

Step 42.1.2.6.2 VERIFY that element person-name exists within each instance of organizationInformationMsg.organization-information-item.center-contact-list.center-contact-details.center-contact-details
Step 42.1.2.7 IF TMDD_N5R31_Contact_Person_Role_Supported is equal to TRUE THEN CONTINUE; OTHERWISE skip the following substeps.
Step 42.1.2.7.1 VERIFY that element person-title exists within each instance of organizationInformationMsg.organization-information-item.organization-contact-details

Step 42.1.2.7.2 VERIFY that element person-title exists within each instance of organizationInformationMsg.organization-information-item.center-contact-list.center-contact-details.center-contact-details
Step 42.1.2.8 IF TMDD_N5R32_Work_Phone_Number_Supported is equal to TRUE THEN CONTINUE; OTHERWISE skip the following substeps.
Step 42.1.2.8.1 VERIFY that element phone-number exists within each instance of organizationInformationMsg.organization-information-item.organization-contact-details

Step 42.1.2.8.2 VERIFY that element phone-number exists within each instance of organizationInformationMsg.organization-information-item.center-contact-list.center-contact-details.center-contact-details
Step 42.1.2.9 IF TMDD_N5R33_Alternate_Phone_Number_Supported is equal to TRUE THEN CONTINUE; OTHERWISE skip the following substeps.
Step 42.1.2.9.1 VERIFY that element phone-alternate exists within each instance of organizationInformationMsg.organization-information-item.organization-contact-details

Step 42.1.2.9.2 VERIFY that element phone-alternate exists within each instance of organizationInformationMsg.organization-information-item.center-contact-list.center-contact-details.center-contact-details
Step 42.1.2.10 IF TMDD_N5R34_Cellular_Phone_Number_Supported is equal to TRUE THEN CONTINUE; OTHERWISE skip the following substeps.
Step 42.1.2.10.1 VERIFY that element mobile-phone-number exists within each instance of organizationInformationMsg.organization-information-item.organization-contact-details

Step 42.1.2.10.2 VERIFY that element mobile-phone-number exists within each instance of organizationInformationMsg.organization-information-item.center-contact-list.center-contact-details.center-contact-details
Step 42.1.2.11 IF TMDD_N5R35_Cellular_Phone_Identifier_Supported is equal to TRUE THEN CONTINUE; OTHERWISE skip the following substeps.
Step 42.1.2.11.1 VERIFY that element mobile-phone-id exists within each instance of organizationInformationMsg.organization-information-item.organization-contact-details

Step 42.1.2.11.2 VERIFY that element mobile-phone-id exists within each instance of organizationInformationMsg.organization-information-item.center-contact-list.center-contact-details.center-contact-details
Step 42.1.2.12 IF TMDD_N5R36_Fax_Number_Supported is equal to TRUE THEN CONTINUE; OTHERWISE skip the following substeps.
Step 42.1.2.12.1 VERIFY that element fax-number exists within each instance of organizationInformationMsg.organization-information-item.organization-contact-details

Step 42.1.2.12.2 VERIFY that element fax-number exists within each instance of organizationInformationMsg.organization-information-item.center-contact-list.center-contact-details.center-contact-details
Step 42.1.2.13 IF TMDD_N5R37_Pager_Number_Supported is equal to TRUE THEN CONTINUE; OTHERWISE skip the following substeps.
Step 42.1.2.13.1 VERIFY that element pager-number exists within each instance of organizationInformationMsg.organization-information-item.organization-contact-details

Step 42.1.2.13.2 VERIFY that element pager-number exists within each instance of organizationInformationMsg.organization-information-item.center-contact-list.center-contact-details.center-contact-details
Step 42.1.2.14 IF TMDD_N5R38_Pager_Identifier_Supported is equal to TRUE THEN CONTINUE; OTHERWISE skip the following substeps.
Step 42.1.2.14.1 VERIFY that element pager-id exists within each instance of organizationInformationMsg.organization-information-item.organization-contact-details
Step 42.1.2.14.2 VERIFY that element pager-id exists within each instance of organizationInformationMsg.organization-information-item.center-contact-list.center-contact-details.center-contact-details
Step 42.1.2.15 IF TMDD_N5R39_Internet_E-Mail_Address_Supported is equal to TRUE THEN CONTINUE; OTHERWISE skip the following substeps.
Step 42.1.2.15.1 VERIFY that element email-address exists within each instance of organizationInformationMsg.organization-information-item.organization-contact-details

Step 42.1.2.15.2 VERIFY that element email-address exists within each instance of organizationInformationMsg.organization-information-item.center-contact-list.center-contact-details.center-contact-details
Step 42.1.2.16 IF TMDD_N5R40_Radio_Unit_Identifier_Supported is equal to TRUE THEN CONTINUE; OTHERWISE skip the following substeps.
Step 42.1.2.16.1 VERIFY that element radio-unit exists within each instance of organizationInformationMsg.organization-information-item.organization-contact-details

Step 42.1.2.16.2 VERIFY that element radio-unit exists within each instance of organizationInformationMsg.organization-information-item.center-contact-list.center-contact-details.center-contact-details
Step 42.1.2.17 IF TMDD_N5R41_Mailing_Address_Line_1_Supported is equal to TRUE THEN CONTINUE; OTHERWISE skip the following substeps.
Step 42.1.2.17.1 VERIFY that element address-line1 exists within each instance of organizationInformationMsg.organization-information-item.organization-contact-details

Step 42.1.2.17.2 VERIFY that element address-line1 exists within each instance of organizationInformationMsg.organization-information-item.center-contact-list.center-contact-details.center-contact-details
Step 42.1.2.18 IF TMDD_N5R42_Mailing_Address_Line_2_Supported is equal to TRUE THEN CONTINUE; OTHERWISE skip the following substeps.
Step 42.1.2.18.1 VERIFY that element address-line2 exists within each instance of organizationInformationMsg.organization-information-item.organization-contact-details

Step 42.1.2.18.2 VERIFY that element address-line2 exists within each instance of organizationInformationMsg.organization-information-item.center-contact-list.center-contact-details.center-contact-details
Step 42.1.2.19 IF TMDD_N5R43_Mailing_Address_City_Supported is equal to TRUE THEN CONTINUE; OTHERWISE skip the following substeps.
Step 42.1.2.19.1 VERIFY that element city exists within each instance of organizationInformationMsg.organization-information-item.organization-contact-details
Step 42.1.2.19.2 VERIFY that element city exists within each instance of organizationInformationMsg.organization-information-item.center-contact-list.center-contact-details.center-contact-details
Step 42.1.2.20 IF TMDD_N5R44_Mailing_Address_State_Supported is equal to TRUE THEN CONTINUE; OTHERWISE skip the following substeps.
Step 42.1.2.20.1 VERIFY that element state exists within each instance of organizationInformationMsg.organization-information-item.organization-contact-details
Step 42.1.2.20.2 VERIFY that element state exists within each instance of organizationInformationMsg.organization-information-item.center-contact-list.center-contact-details.center-contact-details
Step 42.1.2.21 IF TMDD_N5R45_Mailing_Address_Zip_Code_Supported is equal to TRUE THEN CONTINUE; OTHERWISE skip the following substeps.
Step 42.1.2.21.1 VERIFY that element zip-code exists within each instance of organizationInformationMsg.organization-information-item.organization-contact-details
Step 42.1.2.21.2 VERIFY that element zip-code exists within each instance of organizationInformationMsg.organization-information-item.center-contact-list.center-contact-details.center-contact-details
Step 42.1.2.22 IF TMDD_N5R46_Mailing_Address_Country_Supported is equal to TRUE THEN CONTINUE; OTHERWISE skip the following substeps.
Step 42.1.2.22.1 VERIFY that element country exists within each instance of organizationInformationMsg.organization-information-item.organization-contact-details
Step 42.1.2.22.2 VERIFY that element country exists within each instance of organizationInformationMsg.organization-information-item.center-contact-list.center-contact-details.center-contact-details
Step 42.1.2.23 IF TMDD_N5R47_Organization_Center_Information_Supported is equal to TRUE THEN CONTINUE; OTHERWISE skip the following substeps.
Step 42.1.2.23.1 VERIFY that element center-contact-list exists within each instance of organizationInformationMsg.organization-information-item
Step 42.1.2.24 IF TMDD_N5R48_Required_Organization_Center_Information_Supported is equal to TRUE THEN CONTINUE; OTHERWISE skip the following substeps.
Step 42.1.2.24.1 VERIFY that element center-id exists within each instance of organizationInformationMsg.organization-information-item.center-contact-list.center-contact-details
Step 42.1.2.25 IF TMDD_N5R49_Organization_Center_Name_Supported is equal to TRUE THEN CONTINUE; OTHERWISE skip the following substeps.
Step 42.1.2.25.1 VERIFY that element center-name exists within each instance of organizationInformationMsg.organization-information-item.center-contact-list.center-contact-details
Step 42.1.2.26 IF TMDD_N5R50_Organization_Center_Location_Supported is equal to TRUE THEN CONTINUE; OTHERWISE skip the following substeps.
Step 42.1.2.26.1 VERIFY that element center-location exists within each instance of organizationInformationMsg.organization-information-item.center-contact-list.center-contact-details
Step 42.1.2.27 IF TMDD_N5R51_Organization_Center_Description_Supported is equal to TRUE THEN CONTINUE; OTHERWISE skip the following substeps.
Step 42.1.2.27.1 VERIFY that element center-description exists within each instance of organizationInformationMsg.organization-information-item.center-contact-list.center-contact-details
Step 42.1.2.28 IF TMDD_N5R52_Organization_Center_Type_Supported is equal to TRUE THEN CONTINUE; OTHERWISE skip the following substeps.
Step 42.1.2.28.1 VERIFY that element center-type exists within each instance of organizationInformationMsg.organization-information-item.center-contact-list.center-contact-details
Step 42.1.2.29 IF TMDD_N5R53_Organization_Center_Contact_Information_Supported is equal to TRUE THEN CONTINUE; OTHERWISE skip the following substeps.
Step 42.1.2.29.1 VERIFY that element center-contact-details exists within each instance of organizationInformationMsg.organization-information-item.center-contact-list
Step 42.1.2.29.2 VERIFY that element center-contact-details exists within each instance of organizationInformationMsg.organization-information-item.center-contact-list.center-contact-details
Step 42.1.2.30 IF TMDD_N5R54_Date_and_Time_Change_Information_Supported is equal to TRUE THEN CONTINUE; OTHERWISE skip the following substeps.
Step 42.1.2.30.1 VERIFY that element last-update-time exists within each instance of organizationInformationMsg.organization-information-item
Step 42.1.2.31 VERIFY that the values within the REQUEST message are correct per the TMDD standard and known operational conditions.

USER-VERIFY-MESSAGE.functionId: The User Verifies the message content

testStep.functionId: Step 42.1.2.32 CONFIGURE: Set OptionalContentVerified to True

Step 42.1.2.33 POSTCONDITION: PUBLICATION-EC-REPLY with the following parameters: DIALOG=dlOrganizationInformationUpdate OPTIONALCONTENTVERIFIED = OptionalContentVerified PUBLICATIONRESPONSEMESSAGE = PublicationResponseMessage
